name: Strength Sap
effect: Reduce Foe's Strength by 1. User Heals HP equal to the Foe's total Strength (including Stat Changes) before the reduction from Strength Sap. This move only heals if it lowers the Target's Strength. Only applies the healing under stress.
description: The Pokemon looks for a weak spot on its foe, then feeds on its vital energy. The foe is left feeling feeble.
